Detailed Description

template<std::size_t key_length>
struct StringKey< key_length >

A key type to use for a tree that stores a string.

This class creates prefix strings of key_length size, that can be stored in the structure as a key. You must specify in the template instantiation that you want to allow duplicate keys.

This is intended to be used where the key is this class, and the string itself is value used in the tree (or something referring to the string, such as a file offset)

When querying a tree with these in them, you must check each prefix that has the same prefix as the item you're searching for to determine if the correct value is present.
